questions:

B) A stone wall and stairs
C) A busy street
D) A flower garden

B) A stone wall
C) A bench
D) A person

A) A mountain range
B) A stone wall and trees
C) A body of water
D) A busy street

A) A garden

D) A car

A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and uneven
C) Covered with graffiti
D) Made of bricks

A) Flowers

D) Black

D) Cacti
